name: Wah-Wah-Wonderful
description:
Wah-wah-wonderful is a short dating-sim style game about Nintendo's Waluigi, made for a friend of mine. Adventure as the head of the Waluigi fanclub, and meet a mysterious stranger! Who knows how she might change your fate?

Multiple endings, including a true end, are included in the game. 

Notes: 

-Game was made with RenPy, and uses the assets provided for the tutorial game "The Question", as well as a few screenshots of Waluigi found on Google Image Search. 

-Short play experience, meant to be fun!

-Since the only original asset is the writing, this game is 100% free and not meant to be sold- only enjoyed!
